name: Dance Simulator
description:
Welcome to the world of dance. Create your own unique dance.
In our game you need to perform a dance dance, invent new movements, and show the world that you can dance.
This is a real dance simulator.

In the game you are waiting for interesting characters such as, green man, grandmother, the list of characters is constantly updated.
For each character we have a location that you would enjoy the picture in the game.


Heroes
Each hero of the dance is endowed with its own features, unlock the new hero and receive a lot of emotions from his movements.

Just dance it all your task, capture the funniest and most spectacular moments and share with your friends in social networks.

Locations
The levels in the game are ideally optimized for most devices, and are constantly replenished.


Dance moves
Dancing in the game is the main component, for the character you have dozens of movements available, which we regularly update.
Just dance to the music.

If you like to dance, listen to music or just have fun, this game is for you. Develop your skills as a choreographer.

Music
In our game we regularly add hits and just music tracks, you choose them to your taste.

Creating music is not so difficult in fact, how to create a dance, beautiful dance or funny.


Features:
High-grade 3d game
Realistic movements
Large selection of characters
Many musical hits



Play our game, tell us about the problems and suggestions in social networks.
Keep for updates.
